data.name: NeJ
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the poetic universe of NeJ. A snowy forest that speaks of friendship, music, silence and mystery.
In this adventure you will meet a young puppy with whom you will live an incredible story, which begins in the ordinary to open on the fantastic.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the poetic universe of NeJ. A snowy forest that speaks of friendship, music, silence and mystery.
In this adventure you will meet a young puppy with whom you will live an incredible story, which begins in the ordinary to open on the fantastic.
data.short_description: NeJ is a poetic adventure in which you explore a mysterious snowy forest as you try to avoid a looming threat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 (4 * 3200)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 755M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
